Text: Jesus is a HE. Handsome with long hair, pretty much like all the photos show. I am not a Christian however. I prefer the title Jesus Freak.

In the book Isiah you can learn that 
Jesus was not of estetic beauty and if you read the new testament you'll find out that men including Jesus did not have long hair. But as you say you're not a christian(So why say Yaweh Blessed you and all that) so you probably don't read the Bible. Freak is not a nice word no matter the context. I guess you are still asleep.....
